00032 enum excitation_return
00033 {
00034         FREQ_PRINT_NORMALIZATION = 0,
00035         FREQ_LOOP_CONTINUE = 1,
00036         FREQ_LOOP_CARD_CONTINUE = 2
00037 };

00054         {
00055                 return geometry;
00056         }
00057         
00065         double get_maximum_gain()
00066         {
00067                 return m_maximum_gain_db;
00068         }
00069         
00079         double get_radiation_pattern(int theta_index, int phi_index)
00080         {
00081                 return m_radiation_pattern[theta_index*nth + phi_index];
00082         }
00083         
00084         void set_output(nec_output_file in_output, nec_output_flags in_output_flags)
00085         {
00086                 m_output = in_output;
00087                 m_output_flags = in_output_flags;
00088                 
00089                 m_output_fp = m_output.get_fp();
00090         }
00091         
00092         void set_results_stdout(bool flag)
00093         {
00094                 m_results.set_stdout(flag);
00095         }
00096         
00097         void set_gain_only(bool flag)
00098         {
00099                 m_output_flags.set_gain_only(flag);
00100         }
00101         
00106         void geometry_complete(int card_int_1, int card_int_2)
00107         {
00108                 DEBUG_TRACE("geometry_complete()");
00109                 geometry.geometry_complete(this, card_int_1, card_int_2);
00110                 calc_prepare();
00111         }
